subject: as a linkin park fan
body: i'm thankful for [this mashup e sent me of "YMCA" and "in the end" by linkin park](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p3EU-EKiFzU), which i found very beautiful, and i'm thankful that i was just listening to it on the speakers in the living room with deborah after accidentally air dropping her a new york times article i had already airdropped her and i said how i found it very beautiful and after a beat she said "well...as a linkin park fan, i can only hear the original" and i'm thankful that she said "well...as a linkin park fan" because that was very funny to me.
